identity.mission: Create a spiritual, luminous, and highly ergonomic parish website that feels human, not digital.
identity.vibe: Serene, Welcoming, Luminous, Sacred yet Modern.

theme.description: A light-first design using off-whites and warm greys to create a sense of peace and space. No harsh pure blacks.

usage.background: Use 'off_white' or 'paper' for main backgrounds to avoid clinical white.
usage.text_main: Use 'slate_deep' for maximum readability but softer than black.
usage.brand: Use 'slate_blue' for primary buttons and headers.
usage.highlight: Use 'gold_matte' sparingly for divine accents (active states, special buttons).

typography.rules: Headings must be elegant and airy. Body text must be high-contrast for elderly readability.

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous. Use py-24 or py-32 for major sections.
layout_strategy.grid_system: Use 'Bento' grids for News and Services. Avoid uniform rows.

buttons.primary: bg-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-800 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 transition-all duration-300 shadow-md hover:shadow-lg hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-full px-8 py-3
buttons.accent: bg-[#C5A059] hover:bg-[#B08D3D] text-white font-serif tracking-wide rounded-md px-6 py-2 shadow-md

cards.style: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-sm border border-white/20 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300
cards.news_card: overflow-hidden rounded-xl bg-white border-0 shadow-sm group hover:shadow-lg transition-all

navigation.style: Floating glass header. Sticky on scroll. Background: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-100/50.
navigation.mega_menu: Full-width dropdown with 5 distinct columns. Clean typography. No clutter.

header.logo: Use provided logo. Ensure adequate whitespace.
header.cta: Distinct 'HORAIRES DES MESSES' button. Must be visible at all times.

hero.background: Large church photo (provided). Overlay: Gradient from bottom-black/50 to transparent or soft white vignette depending on image contrast.
hero.content: Centered or aligned left. Large welcome message. Quick access buttons.

mass_times_widget.description: A dedicated, high-visibility block or floating element showing the next mass or a link to the schedule. Accessibility is key.
mass_times_widget.location: Hero overlay or Sticky Sidebar on Desktop.

news.layout: 3-column grid. Dynamic content. Show date and category clearly.
news.style: Clean cards with image on top (if available) or elegant typography date block.

footer.style: Dark slate background (slate-900) text-slate-300. Elegant, quiet ending.

iconography.usage: Use icons for the 5 pillars in the menu to give visual cues.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is slate-800 on white. Avoid light grey text.
accessibility.sizing: Touch targets must be 44px+. Text scale adjustable if possible (browser default).

instructions_to_main_agent: Configure tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors (gold_matte, slate_blue, etc).
Create a 'MegaMenu' component for the navigation pillars.
Build the 'MassTimes' component as a high-priority UI element.
Use 'Playfair Display' via Google Fonts import in index.css.
Ensure the 'Contact' and 'Mass Times' are reachable within 1 click (Header/Hero).
Implement the 5-pillar structure exactly as requested in the problem statement.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Do not use gradients for backgrounds unless it is a subtle noise texture overlay.
Avoid standard 'Bootstrap' grid looks. Use asymmetric layouts where appropriate.
All interactive elements must have 'data-testid' attributes.
Do not use complete transparent backgrounds for overlays with content.
